title: FACTs-Flexible AC Transmission System
description: The world is effectively run by AC power, and industries and engineers know this better than anyone. Ever wanted a sneak peek into their inner workings? FACTs - a power electronics based system which enhances controllability and power transfer capabilities of a network - is one such novel system! IEEE Industry Applications Society brings a talk about FACTS by Charles Sao, principal research and development engineer at Hitachi Energy
